issue.title: Accounting for Gaussian components vanishing upon reaching 0 probability mass

content.raw:
As per segway-internal, the changes to the input.master should be as follows:


```
#!C

#ifndef INPUT_PARAMS_FILENAME
DENSE_CPT_IN_FILE inline
<initial parameter values>
MEAN_IN_FILE inline
<initial parameter values>
COVAR_IN_FILE inline
<initial parameter values>
DPMF_IN_FILE inline
<initial parameter values>
#else
DENSE_CPT_IN_FILE INPUT_PARAMS_FILENAME ascii
MEAN_IN_FILE INPUT_PARAMS_FILENAME ascii
COVAR_IN_FILE INPUT_PARAMS_FILENAME ascii
DPMF_IN_FILE INPUT_PARAMS_FILENAME ascii
#endif
```

(possibly with similar changes reflected to the MX/MC components as well)

Notably, the DPMF_IN_FILE lines are moved inside the ifndef.

No changes need to be made to the params files(?), as those are GMTK generated.
